name: Wallet Quest - Public Demo
description:
Go on a journey to retrieve your wallet from a scheming villain!

Discover 5 worlds including the rooftops, the prison, and the warehouse!

Sorry that it's pretty short, this is only the prison world.

INSTRUCTIONS

A and D to move, Space to jump.

TIPS

-Use the gun's recoil and shoot immediately after jumping to increase jump height

-You can mantle over edges of only your legs touch the corner of a platform by running into it.

Music by HEROICIS
